original: intros f1 f2 f3 x l1x l1y l2 l3 Hf1 Hf2 Hf3. apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_1. apply differentiable_pt_lim_comp with (f3 := fun t => mult_fct f1 (fun u => f1 u (f3 t))). - apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_0. apply Hf3. - apply differentiable_pt_lim_ext with (f2 := fun u v => f1 (f2 u) (f3 u)). + intros u v; reflexivity. + apply differentiable_pt_lim_comp with (l2x := l2) (l2y := 0) (l3x := l3) (l3y := 0). * apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_0. apply Hf1. * apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_0. apply Hf2. * apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_0. apply Hf3. - apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_0. apply derivable_pt_lim_mult. + apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_1. apply derivable_pt_lim_comp with (l2 := l3). * apply differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_1. apply Hf2. * apply Hf3. + apply Hf2.
